description: This restaurant in the heart of the old town is a must for anyone keen to try the cuisine of the Casentino region. The friendly chef is more than happy to provide information on his ingredients and to offer recommendations – the strong flavours in evidence and his delicious cuisine are sure to leave a lasting memory.
